title: Admission in PES through JEE MAINS
content:
Scored 97.2%ile in JEE applied through PES website today but no where it asked my jee roll number or percentile and the dashboard camt be used the links dont work
I have mailed the institute pls guide
I have applied for
CSE
AI/ML
ECE

comments.body: I applied too, they said they'll mail a link and you need to upload your mains marks card on it when they send it. they haven't sent it yet but watch your mail.
Can i get cs with 96 percentile?
Ah ok ok any other colleges you looking for?

They took 1200 right? 
And the dashboard is not responding

I asked my pes friend 
He said i might get in
I am giving pessat too
OP plz tell me did u pay the application fee first and then filled the form or the opposite? And i got 95.81 pr do u think i can get cse in pesu?
I paid 1200 and it went to a page asking for further details. After filling it we downloaded the application and that was it
Yeah the page which had fathers name and all

Paid first then filled.
Make sure you do it under btech through jee mains. 
Bro even idk competition has increased severely. High percentile people are also seeking admission in PES ðŸ¥²
Cutoff is very high there all the best

Apply for all 3 branches
CSE
CS (AI/ML)
ECE
Can we apply through both pessat exam and jee scores? Can anyone confirm me
You need to get below 10k for that in jee m
Wtf man why would someone join pes with that rank. Is there any college left in this fucking country who doesnt want fucking AIR 1
They don't want anyone from jee to join them as the fees would diffeent for them

Bhai 10k rank ka matlab jaante ho? 99.5%ile + . Chod  bc management le raha mai at max
I am done with this bs
Bhai management mei 50 l+ for cse ig ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ i am not sure tho
What i heard from my friend in pes is admission is based on percentile not rank. And thanks to this overpopulated country i cant get iiit. Just hoping for pes now.
You need 98 as far as I remember. Someone commented about this on a post a few days ago.

Oh
And what about pessat? Is it required if i go through mains? They haven't asked my mains marks also yet
You don't need to give Mains to give PESSAT, same for the other way round.
I meant if i am seeking admission through mains i dont have to give pessat right?
Nope, as far as I know. Might want to confirm with someone who joined via Mains, but that's rare to find. Best way is to ask PES directly.
I cant find anyone plus office will be closed till monday and then pessat is till next week ðŸ˜­
Why not email them
They copy pasted their website stuff ðŸ¤¡
Then reply back and ask for clarification
I mean i will just call on Monday that will be way better

you applied ok but do you think its worth it? paying 4.8 lakhs per year if you join cs   
if you are a citizen of karnataka you wrote kcet? what happened to that

The ranks this year are trash they have doubled at the same percentile cause the number of candidates increased drastically. So left with no options but private colleges. I reside in Bangalore and ig it's better to get a private college here than dinner tier 2 City. I couldn't give kcet because i don't have domicile. Will give comedk

Even I am your batch only lol
If you revise well enough i believe you have a good chance of getting  rv cse  being a 97.2%iler even after the bs that happened this year 
And pesu doesnt take admissions through comedk
I did. But to be very honest I am tired of all this bs i just want peace i will settle for less ðŸ˜­
how many did u attempted and how many guess work??
Is the admission process closed?
Yeah
Can i get something in pes at 82 percentile
You can check but ig no
Can i get in pes with 91 percentile if at all i get what branch
Can i get in pes with 91 percentile if at all i get what branch
